attributes.action: Glen A Bullivant & Susan A Bullivant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our objection to this Mosque is that the money could be better spent on Health issues for the whole community rather than spend this obscene amount for a minority

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
